name: Get_Question_And_Answer

docs_row.name: Get_Question_And_Answer
docs_row.func_description: Retrieve the question and answer information for a specified hotel.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

q_and_a_pairs.question: Is there a hand shower
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Deluxe Room City View King Bed

q_and_a_pairs.answer: Yes sir, we can provide the same subject to availability at the time of arrival.
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Superior Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hi i have elderly parents and they would arrive in domestic flight and would be travelling on international flight . do you offer early check in around 11am?

q_and_a_pairs.answer: The swimming pool is operational from 06:00 to 22:00 hours daily.
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hello. Do you have swimming pool and is it available to use now? Best regards, Tatiana

observation.average_response_time: This property usually replies within a few days
observation.average_response_time_text: Subject to availability at the property

observation.average_response_time: This property usually replies within a few days

q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Deluxe Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.question: Is there a hand shower
Hi i have elderly parents and they would arrive in domestic flight and would be travelling on international flight . do you offer early check in around 11am?
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Superior Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.answer: Yes sir, we can provide the same subject to availability at the time of arrival.
The swimming pool is operational from 06:00 to 22:00 hours daily.
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hello. Do you have swimming pool and is it available to use now? Best regards, Tatiana

observation.average_response_time_text: Subject to availability at the property

response_summary: The hotel has received several questions from guests, with responses that are generally positive. One guest asked if the Deluxe Room City View King Bed has a hand shower, to which the hotel confirmed with a simple "Yes," receiving 29 votes for helpfulness. Another guest inquired about early check-in around 11 AM for elderly parents traveling between flights, and the hotel responded that they could accommodate the request subject to availability at the time of arrival, earning 27 votes. A third question was about the swimming pool's availability, and the hotel clarified that it operates daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, which received 25 votes. On average, the hotel replies to inquiries within a few days, though response times may vary based on property availability. Guests are encouraged to ask further questions, as the hotel actively participates in the Q&A system.
enhance_func_desc: This API is useful for travelers seeking detailed information about hotel amenities and policies. It retrieves guest questions and hotel responses, covering topics like room features, check-in flexibility, and facility availability. Users can assess the helpfulness of answers through vote counts and gauge response times. The hotel ID must be obtained from SearchHotels or SearchHotelsByCoordinates APIs.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates endpoints.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the Q&A responses (e.g., English, Spanish).

q_and_a_pairs.description: A list of question and answer pairs between guests and the hotel.

ar_items.description: An object representing a single question and answer interaction.

naive_sentiment.description: A sentiment score indicating the positivity of the answer (higher values indicate more positive sentiment).

translated_answer.description: The translated version of the answer, if applicable (null if not translated).

hotel_id.description: The unique identifier for the hotel.

hidden.description: A flag indicating whether the Q&A pair is hidden (0 = visible, 1 = hidden).

is_or_could_be_translated.description: Indicates if the Q&A pair is or could be translated (null if not applicable).

asked_at.description: The timestamp when the question was asked (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

sign_off.description: A sign-off message from the responder, if provided (null if not provided).

answered_at.description: The timestamp when the answer was provided (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

language.description: The language code for the Q&A pair (e.g., 'en' for English).

answer.description: The hotel's response to the guest's question.

answer_time_epoch.description: The Unix epoch timestamp when the answer was provided.

answered_at_formatted.description: The formatted timestamp of when the answer was provided (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

room_id.description: The unique identifier for the room type mentioned in the question (null if not applicable).

ask_time_epoch.description: The Unix epoch timestamp when the question was asked.

room_name.description: The name of the room type mentioned in the question (null if not applicable).

px_upsort_covid_q_and_a_ds_model__would_.description: A flag indicating whether the Q&A pair is related to COVID-19 (1 = yes, 0 = no).

question_id.description: The unique identifier for the question.

translated_question.description: The translated version of the question, if applicable (null if not translated).

votes.description: The number of votes indicating the helpfulness of the Q&A pair.

average_response_time.description: A general description of the hotel's average response time to questions.

collect_q_and_a_questions.description: A flag indicating whether the hotel collects Q&A questions (1 = yes, 0 = no).

hotel_id.description: The unique identifier for the hotel.

average_response_time_text.description: Additional text describing the average response time, often mentioning property availability.

opted_out_of_q_and_a.description: A flag indicating whether the hotel has opted out of the Q&A system (0 = participates, 1 = opted out).

average_response_time_in_seconds.description: The average response time in seconds.

success.description: A flag indicating the success of the API request (1 = success, 0 = failure).
